title: Interpretation of exiting an elevator in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will present to you the interpretation of exiting the elevator in a dream. The elevator is the way to ascend to the upper floors easily, comfortably, and without effort. It is an alternative to climbing the stairs, which consumes a lot of time and effort. Is it for the monarch or is it a warning against evil or evil that may befall him? We will learn all this through the lines of our article today in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of an elevator exit in a dream. An elevator in a dream is good news. Seeing an elevator in a dream is good news that indicates the arrival of goodness to the dreamer. That he will achieve what he wants, and good will comes to him from where he does not expect it. Goodness is obtaining a new job or a promotion at work, or success and distinction or success in personal life. Getting out of a broken elevator in a dream. Whoever sees in a dream that the elevator is broken, this dream indicates that this person has many ambitions and dreams that he wants to achieve, but he will face Some obstacles and obstacles that prevent him from achieving what he wants for some time. . If he sees that he managed to get out of the broken elevator, he will continue on his path to fulfill his dreams. This dream is also a sign that he should not allow the obstacles or obstacles that he faces to prevent him from achieving his dreams. Rather, he must continue to work and work hard and ask God Almighty for help until what he wants is achieved. And when he dreams that he is driving an elevator and it collapses and he is unable to get out of it, this dream is evidence of... The dreamer will face some problems in his life and will not be able to get rid of them. Easily. Interpretation of a dream about a wide elevator: Whoever dreams that he is riding a wide elevator and does not know it until he enters it, this dream indicates that the dreamer is worried about the development of his life’s affairs and that he also feels that he cannot control them. In his peace, that is, he wants to check it out. If he succeeds in stopping the elevator and getting out of it, it is good for him that he will be able to overcome the stress and tension that he is experiencing, and that he will achieve what he aspires to and make the right decisions for that. Interpretation of riding the elevator with one person: If an unmarried girl sees herself riding the elevator with someone and reaching the upper floors, then this dream is good news that she will marry a wealthy young man who will achieve everything she wants in life. But if she goes down the elevator with them, this is a warning to her that a young man will approach her, and deceive her that she will achieve everything she wants, but in reality he will make her live in misery and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about an elevator for a married woman: One of the praiseworthy dreams for a married woman is to dream of an elevator, because it symbolizes the stability that She lives it with her husband and it also indicates the love that each of them has for the other. A woman who has not given birth and sees that she is riding an elevator, then this dream indicates that she is pregnant, and that God Almighty will give her a child that will satisfy her eyes. If a woman sees that she is riding an elevator and it breaks and does not continue to go down, This dream symbolizes that this woman will delay childbearing or that God Almighty will not grant her children. Another unexpected vision is a woman’s dream that she wanted to take the elevator to get home, but she found the elevator broken. This vision shows that there are family problems between her and her husband

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the call to prayer

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream for a single girl. Hearing the call to prayer in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her closeness to God Almighty in her life. If she hears the call and repeats it, this indicates the sincerity of her worship and the love of religion for her. To see that she hears the call to prayer with love in a dream means that she will succeed in being respected by him. Others. A single woman who tries to pray with the sound of the call to prayer shows the good things she is doing. If an unmarried woman calls for prayer in a dream, this indicates the death of someone close to her in life. Watching the call to prayer from a far away place shows that he is gradually getting closer to God. It shows The dream is about good things and a white life that an unmarried girl lives. And if she hears the call to prayer in her home, this indicates that she will perform Hajj soon. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing a mosque or a mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the testimony of hearing the call to prayer in a dream for a married woman. It indicates that a married woman The one who hears the call to prayer in a dream will have a lot of goodness and sustenance in her life. And if she is the one calling the call to prayer in the dream, this indicates the illness of one of her relatives. It explains that she was hearing the call to her home, which indicates the approaching Hajj to her. A married woman who repeats the call to prayer shows her closeness. From God Almighty in her life, God willing. A dream in which she hears the call to prayer in a dream indicates good and good things that she sees in her life. If a married woman hears the call to prayer, this is evidence that she is helping others in their lives. And a married woman who calls in an inappropriate place indicates her hypocrisy. And she does bad things. She explains that if she hears the call to prayer in the toilet, this indicates a mistake she is making on her own. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced woman listening to the call to prayer in her home indicates that she is getting closer to God and her religion. Seeing a divorced woman performing the call to prayer in her home is a sign of The death of one of the family members. And if she hears the call to prayer from her divorce, this indicates that she will return to him again, God willing. And the divorced woman who sees in a dream that she hears the call shows goodness to her. If he hears the call to prayer and recognizes others, this indicates the call of the Islamic religion that he makes. And the divorced woman The one who tried to repeat the call without mistakes indicates the correctness of her worship. It indicates that hearing the call to prayer in a dream indicates the abundance of goodness for her and her family, God willing. Seeing a divorced woman hearing the call to prayer shows her high status in life and the high status of her family. Interpretation of seeing the call to prayer in a dream about a man and its meaning if he hears it If a man hears the call to prayer in a dream, this indicates a new job that he will find. Seeing a man in a dream who hears it in the ear shows the happy life that he lives. A man’s ears on the ground is a sign that he will travel abroad and work for a long time. If he hears the call to prayer in a dream inside his house, then this It indicates the livelihood and blessing that he sees. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream indicates the right things that a person does in his life. Hearing the call to prayer in a dream indicates that he will be saved from the worries and problems in his life, God willing. And the man who calls out in the middle

title: Interpretation of the groom in a dream: Seeing the groom in a dream

preview.html: The dream of a groom for an unmarried woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a fiancée, whether I find a groom to propose to me, handsome or ugly, known or unknown, I do not know death. From the groom in Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of the groom in a dream. Seeing the groom in a dream means good news and sustenance for everyone, but without expressions of joy, dancing, and singing. Seeing the groom in a dream with expressions of sadness indicates the approaching marriage of an unmarried girl, comfort, ease of circumstances, and the removal of worries for married and pregnant women. Seeing a groom in a dream means accompanying a cunning and deceitful man, or losing something valuable, or trying to commit a crime. What the groom means here is a new hope and a new spirit for you in the world, and I believe it is something new that will help you in work or others. Who dreamed that he was a groom: He did not see his woman, and he did not He knows her, or he was named or attributed to him, except that he is called the groom, then he dies, or kills a person, and that has been proven. From the data, if he sees his wife, or knows her, or her name, then it is like marriage. And if he sees that she is married, then he will have authority over her value, virtue, danger, and the importance of her name and beauty if he knows her name or her parents. And if he sees that he has expelled his wife, then he will be removed from his authority, unless he He has free women and slaves. It reduces his authority somewhat. If some of the people of this world see that he is marrying an adulteress, they will fall into a forbidden world. Whoever dreams that he has become a groom and cannot see his bride or does not know her yet, then seeing him indicates the end of his life and his death. Whoever sees in a dream that he has become a groom and sees his bride or that Someone described it to him, then his vision shows that the affairs of life will be easy for him or the world will open to him with all its doors. Whoever sees in a dream a wedding and wedding ceremony interspersed with screaming and dancing, the dream shows the worries and misfortunes that will occur. Interpretation of a dream about a weddingIf a man sees in a dream that he is marrying a woman unknown or unknown, then this man will approach his life or take a position, if that is possible for him in reality. And whoever sees in a dream that he is marrying one of his friends or people, this indicates a good reputation and that the dreamer will be honored among his people. And whoever sees in a dream that he Engaged or married to a woman and then he dies, then he takes up a profession, it will not be profitable, and he leaves it after he gets tired and exhausted in it. And whoever sees in a dream or dream that he married a woman and knows her appearance, name, and characteristics, then he will gain power or authority according to the beauty, goodness, and meaning of the woman’s name, and vice versa. Whoever sees that he has divorced his wife in a dream and a dream, he will be expelled from his position or from his guardianship, or his prestige and authority will be reduced. And whoever sees in a dream that he is marrying, marrying, or marrying an adulterous woman, then he will be involved in forbidden money and a world. And every dream in which there is intercourse and intercourse and leads to A dream is not a dream, and whoever sees in a dream that he is coming to a woman known to him by name, appearance, or both, then the people of her household will benefit from goodness and blessing in their worldly affairs. Interpretation of the groom or bride in a dream Seeing a groom in a dream means that you are sleeping with a cunning and deceitful man or that you will lose something Of great value to you. Also, it shows

title: Interpretation of the dead crying in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we take a look at the interpretation of a dead person crying in a dream to learn about its clearest signs in reality. The dream of crying is one of the disturbing and bad dreams for the dreamer, indicating that something disturbing has happened to him. Seeing a dead person in a dream has many interpretations related to events related to the dreamer or the condition of the deceased. But what about seeing a dead person known to the dreamer crying in a dream? Does seeing him portend something disturbing to him or the dreamer, or is it a sign of kindness and the removal of worries? Interpretation of the dead crying in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of the dead crying by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of this dream that if you see the deceased crying loudly, this indicates his martyrdom in the afterlife, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that the dead is crying, but without a voice, then this vision is good for him and indicates the comfort that he will enjoy in the afterlife. If you see a dead mother crying in a dream, then this dream symbolizes the extent of his love in reality. If we see a dead father crying, then this vision indicates his illness, and God knows best. Among the interpretations of seeing the dead crying in a dream is that it symbolizes the dead’s anger at the monarch for some of his actions in reality. Interpretation of the dead crying in a dream by Al-NabulsiAs for Al-Nabulsi’s opinion, he mentioned that seeing the dead generally reflects the dreamer’s longing to see that dead person again, and indicates the extent of his love for him. If the dreamer sees a dead person crying silently or crying with joy, and his appearance is good in the dream, this indicates his comfort in the afterlife and the best of his circumstances. If you see the dead person crying loudly, then this vision is unpleasant and indicates his need for Charity and supplication, and it may indicate his torment in the afterlife, and God knows best. In the event that the dead person is seen crying without a voice, this vision relates to the state of the seer and may indicate his feeling of remorse for a sin he has already committed. In the event that a woman sees her husband dead, this vision indicates the deceased’s dissatisfaction with the actions of the married woman in reality. Al-Nabulsi explained that if a man sees his dead wife crying in a dream and her appearance is bad, this dream indicates a lack of comfort in the afterlife, and that this vision shows that he is really rebuking him for his actions. Crying of the dead in a dream for an unmarried woman In the event that an unmarried woman sees the deceased crying in a dream, this dream is a message to her that she must be careful about something in reality. As for if she sees her dead father crying in a dream, this dream indicates something disturbing to her that may be a disease, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person crying for a married woman Seeing the dead person in general crying in a dream with a married woman indicates his anger towards the woman who saw the vision, and God knows best. If a married woman sees her dead husband crying in a dream, this dream indicates his betrayal and anger at her. As for seeing her deceased father crying Crying is a dream that indicates that things will change for the worse. Interpretation of seeing a dead person crying in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for the pregnant woman, if she sees her deceased parents crying in a dream, this dream indicates that she is going through many problems and troubles during pregnancy. If the pregnant woman sees the deceased crying without a sound, this vision is good for him

title: Interpretation of seeing washing hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of washing hair in a dream: Hair is an adornment for men and women, especially for women, and from the Sunnah of the Prophet, hair care and washing. News of married and pregnant women, as well as divorcees and widows, by providing great interpretations by interpreters of dreams and visions, such as Imam Ibn Sirin and other imams, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of washing hair in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? To dream that you are washing your hair in a dream indicates Purifying oneself and repenting from sins. Seeing yourself washing long hair indicates good conditions, abundant sustenance, and good things that the dreamer should bring. Dreaming of washing hair with mud indicates joy and happiness after sadness and anxiety. Dreaming about washing hair with water and soap indicates joy, happiness, and increased nutrition. A dream about washing your hair with honey or milk indicates illegal actions and a crime. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing your hair in front of people? Seeing yourself bathing with water in front of people indicates an abundance of sustenance and many good things. If a married woman sees that an unknown man is washing her hair in front of people, this indicates To reveal secrets or scandal and cause major problems. Seeing one’s hair being washed with scented water means hearing good news and may indicate success, prosperity, and parental approval. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing one’s hair for a divorced woman? If a divorced woman sees that she is washing her hair, this indicates the beginning of a new life and God will compensate her with goodness. If a divorced woman sees that she is washing her hair with shampoo in a dream, this indicates her victory over her enemies and the realization of what she longed for in life. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing hair with soap for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees herself washing her hair with water and soap in a dream, this indicates Good luck and hearing good news. If an unmarried woman sees that she has washed her hair and then dried it, this indicates that she is going through an emotional experience that will lead to marriage and that she will be happy in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing hair with henna? Seeing yourself bathing with henna means that you will hear good news. Washing hair Of henna in a patient’s dream indicates recovery from illness and good health. Washing hair with henna in a dream indicates positive changes and may indicate revealing secrets. What is the interpretation of washing hair in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing washing hair in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates safety, security and stability. Psychological. Seeing hair washing in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the approach and facilitation of childbirth and the peaceful passage of the postpartum period. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a single woman? Seeing washing hair in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the arrival of goodness and a decent life. If a girl has long hair In a dream, she sees that she is washing it, this indicates an abundance of sustenance, and if she sees a man washing her hair, this indicates the approach of her marriage. If an unmarried woman sees that she is washing her hair with dirty water, this portends evil and evil in her life. We are pleased to see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of a dream about washing Poetry” through comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

If an unmarried girl sees herself washing her hair with water and soap in a dream, this indicates good luck and hearing good news. If an unmarried woman sees that she washed her hair and then dried it, this indicates that she is going through an emotional experience that leads to marriage and is happy in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing hair with henna? Seeing yourself bathing with henna means that you will hear good news. Washing hair from henna in a dream for a sick person indicates recovery from illness and good health. Washing hair from henna in a dream indicates positive changes and may indicate revealing secrets. What is the interpretation of washing hair in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing hair washing in a pregnant woman's dream indicates safety, security and psychological stability. Seeing hair washing in a pregnant woman's dream indicates the approach and facilitation of childbirth and the peaceful passage of the postpartum period. What is the interpretation of a dream about washing hair for a single woman? Seeing hair washing in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the arrival of goodness and life Generous. If a girl has long hair in a dream and sees that she is washing it, this indicates an abundance of sustenance, and if she sees a man washing her hair, this indicates that her marriage is approaching. If an unmarried woman sees that she is washing her hair with dirty water, this portends evil and evil in her life. We are pleased to see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of a dream about washing hair” through the comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, answer and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of dreams about talking to someone I do not know

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by talking to someone I don't know Seeing someone you don't know in a dream is a confusing dream for many, but... Interpretation of dreams by talking to someone I don't know Commentators have talked about it in detail and mentioned its effects and what it symbolizes in good and evil. What is the interpretation of seeing a stranger in a dream? The Mukhtilafat website explains the interpretation of seeing the interpretation of a dream of talking to someone you don't know as follows: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is talking to someone he cannot recognize, but he talked to him a lot and told him many things, then this vision is an indication of the things that the sleeper is going through. Which crowds and disrupts his life and causes him psychological disturbances. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is talking to a stranger but he is sad and cried in his dream, then this vision indicates the illness of one of the dreamer's children and he needs medicine for the illness. While the sleeper was talking in his dream with a woman he does not know, and the conversation between them was beautiful and they laughed, then this vision indicates that this man will fall in love with a woman and marry her. Whether this dreamer is married or not. Interpretation of dreams of talking to someone I do not know from Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi says about the interpretation of the dream of talking to someone I do not know as follows: If a married woman sees that she is talking to a stranger about whom she does not know anything, then the interpretation of this dream is a sign and an indication that this woman leaves her house decorated, and men see her and are fascinated by her. While a single woman sees in her dream that she meets a person she cannot recognize and loves, and talks to him for a long time, then the interpretation of this vision in it is an indication that this girl who dreams of this vision will soon get someone who loves her, nourishes her and engages her. As for the pregnant woman who talks to a stranger in her dream, this is an indication that she will give birth to a beautiful child and spend her time talking, talking and playing with him. And if a man talks to another man in his dream, and he does not know him, then the interpretation of this vision is a sign of falling into a great predicament, as well as a sign of narrow management and theft of the well-being. Talking to the widow with a stranger, this vision indicates that there is one of this woman’s relatives who admires her and wants to marry her, but she She refuses and prefers to seek to raise her children. As for talking to a divorced woman with many people she does not know, this vision shows that the reason for this woman's divorce is her bad morals, and the pursuit of gossip among people, as well as the weakness of religion and the message. Of the great sins. Interpretation of a dream of talking to a stranger in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of a dream of talking to a person I do not know in the following dream: If an unmarried woman talks to a man in her dream, and she does not know him, and this man is married, then this vision indicates that this girl is in love with someone, but she does not care about him and looks. To the house, his wife and children. And for a married woman to hear her husband's voice in a dream is a sign that this married woman loves her husband very much and seeks to please him. Her husband. As for a married woman talking to a stranger, it indicates betrayal and that this woman does not love the one she marries and that

title: Interpretation of a dream about black ants by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black ants: Ants are considered one of the most important insects that cause anxiety to viewers, so many people think about seeing ants from visions that do not bode well, as they can differ in most interpretations between good and evil, and this is what we will explain in this article. Interpretation of a dream about black ants may indicate Seeing black ants in a dream indicates that the dreamer may suffer from a difficult disease that will make him unable to live his life for some time. Sometimes, a dream of black ants walking on the dreamer's body can indicate that he will have good offspring. If the dreamer sees a large number of ants and cannot count them, then this dream is an indication that his mind is occupied with many useless matters. If Black ants walking in the dreamer’s hair, then this dream is a sign that he may be exposed to serious health problems. From the point of view of Imam Nabulsi, he saw that a dream about black ants could be a sign of a serious illness that could lead to death. Interpretation of a dream about black ants by Ibn SirinIf the dreamer sees If black ants are walking on the fortuneteller’s new clothes, this is evidence that he is a person who does not feel any satisfaction with what he is experiencing in life. Watching black ants collect His food, this dream is evidence of the many events that will occur in the life of the dreamer, but he must struggle and make a lot of efforts. If the dreamer is going through a financial crisis and sees black ants in his dream, this dream suggests that he will get rid of these crises and stumble as quickly as possible. Possible. Seeing ants has generally been interpreted as a big profit that the dreamer will be able to make soon. Interpretation of a dream about black ants for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees that black ants are walking on her clothes, this means that she is not satisfied with her life and what she has, and that she is looking at what she has In the hands of others. In the event that a girl sees black ants in her dream, this means that she is committing many sins and sins because she is sitting with bad friends. In some interpretations, seeing ants in a girl’s dream indicates that she is spending her money in vain, which will lead to her falling into a crisis Financial. Black ants in the dreamer’s dream, while she is in her bed, may indicate that she is about to marry and get married. If black ants walk on the girl’s body, this indicates that she does not commit sins and tries as much as possible to avoid mistakes. Interpretation of a dream about black ants for a married woman, interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin Black ants in a married woman’s dream are a sign that she will get a lot of money soon. If a married woman who has suffered from financial difficulties sees black ants leaving her house, this indicates that she will be able to eliminate this crisis and that her situation will be good. There is an interpretation It says that the entry and exit of black ants at the same time is not a good vision, because it indicates the judgment that will fall on that woman. Small black ants in a woman’s dream indicate fears and anxiety that will affect her life.

title: Interpretation of seeing reeds in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The results of this vision vary between good and evil, as the dreamer sees reeds on more than one occasion, the interpretations of which are as follows: Seeing reeds planted in the field in a dream means that the dreamer will be freed from troubles and sorrows and will reach high homes. When the dreamer buys reeds, this indicates the presence of family problems and he must treat his family with distinction and intelligence. When sucking straw in a dream is evidence of sins and gossip, in addition to the emergence of problems and obstacles that drain him of a lot of energy to solve them. When reeds are given in a dream to someone as a gift, this indicates that God will provide the dreamer with a lot of wealth after waiting for a long time. If one sees in a dream that he is leaning on a cane of reeds .. This means that the dreamer will suffer from illness, so he must be careful and maintain his health. In addition, the vision indicates the dreamer's success in achieving what he wants from achievements and reaching desires in his scientific and practical life. Sucking sugar cane indicates the spread of gossip in the world. After all, the vision shows that you will get a lot of money without making efforts to obtain it. Interpretation of a dream about reeds in Dream Ibn Sirin He said Ibn Sirin to see reeds in a dream Many of what he saw is a warning and good news, and its interpretations are as follows: Ibn Sirin sees that reeds in a dream indicate the transmission of speech from one person to another ... which leads to the ignition of strife among people. Moreover, it refers to the man who carries a page of betrayal and fails to fulfill the promises he made. Moreover, it refers to the person who does not pay his debt despite his ability to do so. If the dreamer stumbles over a reed, this means that death is near. Sucking straw in a dream indicates that the dreamer did something that made people talk about him wrongly. When the seer presses the reed to extract juice from it, it foretells that God will give him abundant benefit and strength. When the reed sticks turn into golden and silver sticks .. This indicates that the fortuneteller does good deeds that bring good to him and those around him. In addition, seeing reeds means that you will get a lot of money after several attempts. When reeds are planted in a place that is not suitable for agriculture, this indicates a deterioration in conditions That place. When the dreamer sees many sticks made of reeds, this indicates that people encourage him in a negative and false way to the point that it spreads distress in his heart. Interpretations of the reed in a dream in Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets other examples of this vision as follows: Dreams of reeds indicate that God - Glory be to Him - compensates the dreamer for everything bad he saw in his life ... in addition to giving him a lot of good and benefits. When reeds are planted in a land that is not suitable for agriculture in general, this indicates that the dreamer will face a big problem that will lead to many defects and negative results. When a person carries reeds in his sleep, this indicates the good that God grants him. When a person dreams of carrying a single reed in his hand, this foretells that he will be able to win the heart of the girl he loves. Interpretation of a vision

Interpretation of a dream about canes in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that seeing canes in a dream is a lot of what he saw. A warning and good news, and its interpretations are as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that a cane in a dream indicates the transmission of speech from one person to another...which leads to the ignition of strife among people. Moreover, it indicates a man who carries the page of betrayal and fails to fulfill the promises he made. Moreover, it refers to a person who does not repay his debt despite his ability to do so. If the dreamer stumbles over a straw, this means that death is near. Sucking a straw in a dream indicates that the dreamer did something that made people talk about him wrongly. When he presses The dreamer looks at the reeds to extract the juice from them, it foretells that God will give him abundant benefit and sustenance. When the reed sticks turn into gold and silver sticks... this indicates that the fortuneteller is performing good deeds that bring goodness to him and those around him. In addition, seeing the reeds means that you You will get a lot of money after several attempts. When reeds are planted in a place that is not suitable for cultivation, this indicates the deterioration of the conditions of that place. When the dreamer sees many sticks made of reeds, this indicates that people are encouraging him in a negative and false way to the point that it spreads distress in his heart. Interpretations of reeds in a dream. In Ibn Sirin, other examples of this vision are interpreted by Ibn Sirin as follows: Dreams of reeds indicate that God - Glory be to Him - compensates the dreamer for every bad thing he has seen in his life... in addition to giving him a lot of goodness and benefits. When reeds are planted in unsuitable land To cultivate in general, this indicates that the dreamer will face a big problem that will lead to many defects and negative results. When a person carries a reed in his sleep, this indicates the goodness that God gives him. When someone dreams of holding a single reed in his hand, this foretells that he will be able Who wins the heart of the girl he loves. Interpretation of a vision
